trans-unit.source: Validates whether the value of an associated input control matches the pattern specified by a regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 验证是否相关输入控件的值与指定正则表达式模式匹配。

trans-unit.source: The RegularExpressionValidator control checks whether the value of an input control matches a pattern defined by a regular expression.
trans-unit.target: RegularExpressionValidator 控件检查输入控件的值是否与由正则表达式定义的模式匹配。

trans-unit.source: This type of validation allows you to check for predictable sequences of characters, such as those in e-mail addresses, telephone numbers, and postal codes.
trans-unit.target: 此验证类型允许你查看的字符，如电子邮件地址、 电话号码和邮政编码的可预测序列。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Validation succeeds if the input control is empty.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 验证成功的输入的控件是否为空。

trans-unit.source: If a value is required for the associated input control, use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> control in addition to the RegularExpressionValidator control.
trans-unit.target: 如果关联的输入控件需要一个值，则使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>除了 RegularExpressionValidator 控件的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>

trans-unit.source: Both server-side and client-side validation are performed unless the browser does not support client-side validation or client-side validation is explicitly disabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.EnableClientScript%2A> property to `false`).
trans-unit.target: 除非浏览器不支持客户端验证或显式禁用客户端验证执行服务器端和客户端验证 (通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.EnableClientScript%2A>属性`false`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.EnableClientScript%2A>

trans-unit.source: The regular-expression validation implementation is slightly different on the client than on the server.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式验证实现是比在服务器上的客户端上略有不同。

trans-unit.source: On the client, JScript regular-expression syntax is used.
trans-unit.target: 在客户端，使用了 JScript 正则表达式语法。

trans-unit.source: On the server, <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex?displayProperty=fullName> syntax is used.
trans-unit.target: 在服务器上，<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex?displayProperty=fullName>使用语法。</xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Since JScript regular expression syntax is a subset of <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex?displayProperty=fullName> syntax, it is recommended that JScript regular-expression syntax be used in order to yield the same results on both the client and the server.
trans-unit.target: 由于 JScript 正则表达式语法已的子集<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex?displayProperty=fullName>语法中，建议 JScript 正则表达式语法用于为了生成客户端和服务器上相同的结果。</xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When you use the RegularExpressionValidator control inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control, make sure that the validator control and the control it is associated with are in the same panel.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 当你使用内部 RegularExpressionValidator 控件<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制，请确保该验证程序控件与之关联的控件位于同一面板。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control for partial-page updates, see [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>，控制为部分页面更新，请参阅[局部页面呈现概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: For additional information about validation controls, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator>.
trans-unit.target: 有关验证控件的其他信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator>

trans-unit.source: For more information on regular expressions, see [.NET Framework Regular Expressions](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式的详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 正则表达式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Accessibility For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何配置此控件，以使其生成符合辅助功能标准的标记可访问性的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RegularExpressionValidator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RegularExpressionValidator"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Adds to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object the HTML attributes and styles that need to be rendered for the control.
trans-unit.target: 将添加到指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref>对象的 HTML 特性和需要呈现的控件的样式。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> ，它表示要在客户端呈现 HTML 内容的输出流。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the value in the input control is valid.
trans-unit.target: 指示输入控件中的值是否有效。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value in the input control is valid; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果输入控件中的值是有效，则为否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or set the maximum time interval to execute a single matching operation before the operation times out.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置最大时间间隔，以执行单个匹配操作在执行操作前的会超时。

trans-unit.source: The maximum time interval to execute a single matching operation before the operation times out.
trans-unit.target: 最大时间间隔，以执行单个匹配操作在执行操作前的已超时。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the regular expression that determines the pattern used to validate a field.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置确定用于验证字段的模式的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the pattern used to check for predictable sequences of characters, such as those in social security numbers, e-mail addresses, telephone numbers, and postal codes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于指定用于检查的字符，如社会安全号码、 电子邮件地址、 电话号码和邮政编码的可预测序列的模式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RegularExpressionValidator> does not perform validation on an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RegularExpressionValidator>不在空字符串时执行验证。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RegularExpressionValidator>

trans-unit.source: If the string you are testing might be empty, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> as well as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RegularExpressionValidator>.
trans-unit.target: 如果要测试的字符串可能为空，则使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>以及<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RegularExpressionValidator>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RegularExpressionValidator> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>

trans-unit.source: For more information on regular expressions, see [.NET Framework Regular Expressions](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式的详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 正则表达式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you experience problems with pattern matching constructs, try wrapping the expression with "^(" and ")$".
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果你遇到与模式匹配构造问题，请尝试包装与表达式"^ （"和"） $"。

trans-unit.source: For example, "a|ab" becomes "^(a|ab)$".
trans-unit.target: 例如，"| ab"变为"^(a|ab)$"。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies the regular expression used to validate a field for format.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，指定用于验证格式的字段的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression is not properly formed.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式的格式不正确。
